text: You start your day like you start everyday, you are at work in a meeting. Your Boss (Paul) is telling you and your co-workers where you are going to be inspecting today, You are going to be inspecting the Hammer Valley Dam.
You are in a corridor on the 7th floor, Your Boss reminds you to not forget your hard-hat.
You can see some stairs, your co-workers are talking about public transport and how the tunnels arent going to suddenly collapse.
